Text.Page:
A nexus unleashes a vast amount of energy. We're curious about what effect that energy has on the land.

Here is a specimen jar for storing contaminated samples. Enter a nexus and collect soil samples.

Good luck.

With but a glance I can see the nexus leached out all the nutrients from the soil in this jarâ€”the life-sustaining properties that make soil a home for plants and animals.

This doesn't bode well for us. Not well at all.
